name: volt-absorb

effect.black_white: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.black_2_white_2: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.black_white: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
